rules_text:
Ward–Pay 3 life. [i](Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays 3 life.)[/i]
Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, choose menace, deathtouch, or lifelink. Put a counter of that kind on this creature. Each other creature you control gains that ability until end of turn.
